Product title: All-Purpose Stainless Steel Shower Squeegee for Shower Glass Door with 2 Adhesive Hooks, Bathroom Cleaner Tool Household Window Mirror Squeegee , Cleaning Tile Wall, Car, 10 Inch Silver
Key Features: 【Streak Free & Squeak Free】: Docrok squeegee for shower glass door will effortless remove the water drops, soap scum and other sources of buildup of your shower glass door cleaner and other surfaces with just a few wipes. Getting your cleaning activities done fast and easy with no streak and squeak. | 【Sturdy & Durable】: Made of 100% rust-resistant stainless steel and premium silicon blade, our shower squeegeee, shower door squiggy with exquisite craft ensure the durability and long lasting use for your daily household cleaning activities. A must have window squeegee for window cleaning, bathroom squeegee for shower glass doors. | 【Ergonomic Design】: Features an ergonomic structure and precise cut silicone blade, this shower glass squeegee car squeegee provides you a comfortable anti-slip grip to efficiently clean your tile show walls with minimum time and effort. | 【All-Purpose Squeegee】: This all-purpose squeegee is great for shower glass doors, tile shower walls, car windows, mirrors and any other smooth and flat surfaces. A must have cleaning tool for indoor and outdoor use. | 【Easy Storage & Use】: Comes with 2 kinds of waterproof adhesive hooks which can be attached to any smooth surface, you can hang the squeegee on the shower walls, kitchen and any other places for easy reach and use.
comment 1: This squeegee does the trick, it cleans very well, no streaks. It’s also weighted nicely, doesn’t feel flimsy. It also looks very elegant/high end. Great deal for the price.FYI you are supposed to rest it rubber edge out, otherwise a little notch gets made with the rubber leaning against metal. It happened to us, not a huge deal. - Todd Gillman
comment 2: This stainless steel shower squeegee is sturdy and works great on glass doors and mirrors. The 10-inch size is perfect, and it removes water without leaving streaks. I also love the two adhesive hooks — easy to install and very convenient. Great quality and very useful for everyday cleaning. - Rosalia Houtmann
comment 3: As advertised, looks great and works well. - Felipe A Martinez
comment 4: I really like this shower squeegee. The stainless steel design looks modern and sturdy, and the two adhesive hooks are very convenient for keeping everything organized. It works perfectly on shower glass doors, mirrors, and windows, leaving surfaces clean and streak-free. The rubber blade glides smoothly and does a great job.I’m giving it 4 stars only because the handle could be a bit more ergonomic, but overall it’s an excellent product that works just as described. - María del Pilar
comment 5: This squeegee works extremely well.  The rubber blade is thin enough to be flexible so you only need one swipe to remove all of the water where you're working.  I had purchased a different brand with a thicker blade which was not flexible.  That other squeegee took several swipes to actually get all the water off the walls and floor of the shower.I'm very please with this product. - FairwayLife
